entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
